forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. Slight chance of a rain shower. High around 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, then partly cloudy for the afternoon. High around 60F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this evening, then becoming cloudy after midnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low near 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 16C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 54F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected. Locally heavy rainfall possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain likely. High 59F. Winds SSE at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected. Locally heavy rainfall possible.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with thundershowers developing late. Low 8C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Locally heavy rainfall possible.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain early. Showers with perhaps a rumble of thunder developing late. Low 47F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Locally heavy rainfall possible.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 7C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low around 45F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Chance of a shower or two during the morning, followed by partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds NNW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low near 5C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low 43F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning then becoming cloudy with periods of rain later in the day. High 14C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to cloudy skies and rain in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 49F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 14C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High near 60F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low around 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 51F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High near 15C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 61F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low near 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 51F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 13C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 57F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 7C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 46F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 14C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 58F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 7C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 47F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
